description: *Giant ravens receive a +4 racial bonus on Spot checks during daylight hours. TRAINING A GIANT RAVEN Although intelligent, a giant raven requires training before it can bear a rider in combat. To be trained, a giant raven must have a friendly attitude toward the trainer (this can be achieved through a successful Diplomacy check). Training a friendly giant raven requires six weeks of work and a DC 25 Handle Animal check. Riding a giant raven requires an exotic saddle. A giant raven can fi ght while carrying a rider, but the rider cannot also attack unless he or she succeeds on a Ride check. Giant raven eggs are worth 1,500 gp apiece on the open market, while hatchlings are worth 2,500 gp each. Profes- sional trainers charge 1,000 gp to rear or train a giant raven.
name: Skills
